description: React component for a test script generation page with progress simulation, controls, and status display.

methods.name: startRun
methods.description: Starts the simulated test script run, updating progress periodically.

methods.name: cancelRun
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing test script run.

methods.name: resetRun
methods.description: Resets the progress and status to initial state.

methods.name: statusText
methods.description: Returns a string representing the current status.
